Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class, dedicated to all and each game related actions and information

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int gameID, int numPlayers, Player host)
      Constructor for the Game class
      Parameters:
      gameID - unique ID (who calls the method will make sure the ID chosen is not being used already)
      numPlayers - maximum amount of players allowed in the Game

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player) throws NumOfPlayersException
      Method used to link a Player to this Game
      Parameters:
      player - the Player who's trying to join this Game
      Throws:
      NumOfPlayersException - tells the Player there's no more room in this Game

    • gameStartConstructor

      public void gameStartConstructor()
      Initializes the scoreboard, all 4 decks (and shuffles them), the 2 gold and 2 resource Cards face-up on the table and gives a random StarterCards to each player

    • postColorSelectionSetUp

      public void postColorSelectionSetUp()
      Method used to set each Player's hand and their pair of ObjectiveCards, also calls drawSharedObjectiveCards() to set the 2 ObjectiveCards shared by all Players

    • drawSharedObjectiveCards

      public void drawSharedObjectiveCards()
      Method used to draw the 2 ObjectiveCards shared by all Players in this Game

    • andTheWinnersAre

      public List<Player> andTheWinnersAre()
      Method that decides the winner(s) based on the Game rules
      Returns:
      a List of all winning Players (at least one)
